name: letterblack-ae-ai-chat
description: Letterblack AI Chat - AI Chat Extension for Adobe After Effects

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-source
scripts.deploy: powershell -Command "$dest = Join-Path $env:APPDATA 'Adobe\CEP\extensions\com.letterblack.ae.ai.chat'; if (!(Test-Path $dest)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $dest -Force | Out-Null } ; Copy-Item -Path 'com.letterblack.ae.ai.chat\*' -Destination $dest -Recurse -Force ; Write-Output 'Deployed to CEP extensions folder'"

author: pravesh.pandey@letterblack.ae
